channel.title: godel-escher-bach on Jeff Glass
channel.description: Recent content in godel-escher-bach on Jeff Glass
channel.item:
Designing 3-Way Initial Blocks [Video] https://jeff.glass/post/designing-3-way-initial-blocks-video/ Sun, 01 Apr 2018 21:30:26 -0500 https://jeff.glass/post/designing-3-way-initial-blocks-video/

In my experimentsÂ  with Fusion360 recently and casting around for inspiration, I stumbled across my old copy of Godel, Escher, Bach: An Eternal Golden Braid, which has a curious cover design consisting of two objects that cast shadows of three different letters along three different axes. In the following video, I look at the process of designing one of these shapes with arbitrary letters for 3D printing.

<
